name: http-otro
description: Easily configurable basic http requests on top of isomorphic-fetch

scripts.build:umd: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=development webpack src/index.js dist/http-otro.js
scripts.build:umd:min: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=production webpack src/index.js dist/http-otro.min.js
scripts.build: npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:es && npm run build:umd && npm run build:umd:min
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run build
